description:
Ikoma is a young steam smith who makes a living in Aragane Station making iron and steam engines. He and his good friend http://anidb.net/ch78934 [Takumi] developed a weapon called Tsuranuki Zutsu in order to defeat the Kabane. Everyone makes light of him now, but he looks forward to a day when he will be triumphant.
Source: ANN
name: Ikoma
